00033   mIsKey = true;

00041 MediaDataWrapper*
00042 MediaDataWrapper :: make(IMediaData* obj)
00043 {
00044   MediaDataWrapper* retval = make();
00045   if (retval)
00046   {
00047     retval->wrap(obj);
00048   }
00049   return retval;
00050 }

00076 IBuffer*
00077 MediaDataWrapper :: getData()
00078 {
00079   IBuffer* retval=0;
00080   // forward to wrapped object
00081   if (mWrapped)
00082   {

00112 void
00113 MediaDataWrapper :: wrap(IMediaData*aObj)
00114 {
00115   IMediaDataWrapper* wrapper=dynamic_cast<IMediaDataWrapper*>(aObj);
00116   // loop detection to make sure we're not wrapping ourselves.
00117   if (wrapper) {
00118     RefPointer<IMediaData> obj;
00119     IMediaDataWrapper *me = static_cast<IMediaDataWrapper*>(this);
00120     do
00121     {
00122       if (wrapper == me)
00123         break;
00124       obj = wrapper->get();
00125     } while (0 != (wrapper = dynamic_cast<IMediaDataWrapper*>(obj.value())));
00126     
00127     if (wrapper == me)
00128     {
00129       VS_LOG_ERROR("Attempted to wrap an object that ultimately wraps itself.  Ignoring");
00130       // we're wrapping ourselves
00131       return;
00132     }
00133   }
00134   mWrapped.reset(aObj, true);
00135   if (aObj)
00136   {
00137     setTimeStamp(aObj->getTimeStamp());
00138     IRational *base = aObj->getTimeBase();
00139     setTimeBase(base);
00140     VS_REF_RELEASE(base);
00141     setKey(aObj->isKey());
00142   }
00143   else
00144   {
00145     setTimeStamp(Global::NO_PTS);
00146     setTimeBase(0);
00147     setKey(true);
00148   }
00149 }
00150 
00151 void
00152 MediaDataWrapper :: setData(com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer *buffer)
00153 {
00154   if (mWrapped)
00155     mWrapped->setData(buffer);
00156 }
00157 
00158 IMediaData*
00159 MediaDataWrapper :: get()
00160 {
00161   return mWrapped.get();
00162 }
00163 
00164 IMediaData*
00165 MediaDataWrapper :: unwrap()
00166 {
00167   RefPointer<IMediaData> unwrapped = get();
00168   
00169   // as long unwrapped points to an IMediaDataWrapper, then unwrap
00170   while(unwrapped && dynamic_cast<IMediaDataWrapper*>(unwrapped.value()))
00171     unwrapped = (dynamic_cast<IMediaDataWrapper*>(unwrapped.value()))->get();
00172   return unwrapped.get();
00173 }
